<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ward Against Corruption](/Feats.aspx?ID=1372) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your soul is warded against the power of undeath and plague, as well as that of the evil former psychopomps known as sahkils. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), and all effects from [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) or sahkils. This bonus increases to +2 against an undead or sahkil's death effect or disease.
name: Ward Against Corruption
